original_title: Come On Over to Barney's House
overview: See Barney's House for the first time ever and share the fun with a houseful of his guests. At Barney's house, imagination can make anything happen at any time. That's why BJ, Baby Bop and some of their young friends are treated to surprising inventions, rock n roll singing birds, a web-surfing mouse, storybook visitors, and much more!
title: Come On Over to Barney's House
